benchmark_details.name: ARC (Abstraction and Reasoning Corpus)
benchmark_details.overview: ARC evaluates the generalization and abstract reasoning capabilities of AI systems via visual abstract reasoning tasks requiring solutions to be inferred from a small set of training instances.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective is to assess the reasoning and generalization capabilities of LLMs on various abstract reasoning tasks.

data.source: The dataset consists of 1000 unique tasks with 400 for training and 600 for evaluation, split into a public and private subset.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the accuracy of solutions to test instances against their corresponding outputs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy reflects better generalization and reasoning capabilities.
methodology.baseline_results: Top performance from previous solvers is used for comparison.
